group_1.textLeft: No way, no way!
How could it be that the leaders of the new Wings@of the Magius were Miyabi and Azumi?!

group_1.textRight: ...I'm sorry...

group_1.textLeft: Why are you apologizing?

group_1.textRight: I mean...@You're disappointed to see us, right...?

group_1.textLeft: ...I don't deny that.

group_1.textRight: I knew it...

group_1.textLeft: That said, this was unexpected.
Having known you two from the time of@the Wings of the Magius,
I never thought you'd be taking the initiative@like this.

group_1.textRight: W-we know we're not cut out for this...
But... Magical Girl supremacy is our hope...
So...@We don't want to give up...

group_1.textLeft: That's why we... formed this organization...
The new Wings of the Magius... called the@"Neo-Magius"...
(Their commitment to Magical Girl supremacy@does seem to be sincere.)
Are there any others with you?

group_1.textRight: Ah, yes...@We've gathered a lot of people, but...
I'm not sure if we can manage to pull everyone@along on our own...
Until we get Lady Touka and Lady Nemu to join us...

group_1.textLeft: Well, of course...
（...I mean, if you're shaking just by talking to me...)

group_1.textRight: So, Instructor...
We'd like you to work with us... as the Neo-Magius...
You're strong... and smarter than us...
I'm sure you will be able to lead everyone better...
I see, I see!
It seems like Azumi and Miyabi understand@how wonderful you are, Lady San!
So, what do we do?

group_1.textLeft: I cannot be the brains of the Neo-Magius.

group_1.textRight: B-but Instructor...
You want to spread Magical Girl supremacy too,@right...?!

group_1.textLeft: I have neither the charisma nor the conviction@of the Magius.
There's no way I can be a leader;@I'm more of a lieutenant, at best.

group_1.textRight: Awawa... I can't believe the Instructor@turned us down...!
What should we do...@We've got nowhere else to turn to...

group_1.textLeft: Even the Magius couldn't achieve this plan.
Any half-hearted activity will only end in futility.
There's no way I'd join knowing that.

group_1.textRight: ...We're not...half-hearted at all...

group_1.textLeft: (Huh... My phone?@I got a message...)
[chara:103101:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!

group_1.textRight: Um... Instructor...@Is something wrong...?
Lady San...?

group_1.textLeft: Big Bro Tatsu got caught up in a violent incident...!

group_1.textRight: Wh-what...?!

group_1.textLeft: We're going back to the Community Center@right away!

group_1.textRight: W-wait...!@What about us...?

group_1.textLeft: Sorry, but we'll have to talk again next time.

group_1.textRight: ...What do you mean, next time...?

group_1.textLeft: When you find a new leader, let me know.
I'll reconsider joining the Neo-Magius then.
Ah...

group_1.textRight: There they go...
